identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster aesthetics with Industrial Control Panels.
Content is King: Data density is a feature, not a bug. Make it scannable.
Contrast: Stark Black/White with Safety Orange accents.
Negative Space: Use it to group logic, not just for decoration.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Modal titles

body.usage: General UI text, descriptions, form labels

mono.usage: IDs, Dates, Logs, File paths, Status codes

rules: Labels must be uppercase and wide: uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-medium text-muted-foreground
Data cells must be mono: font-mono text-sm

usage_rules: Primary Color (Safety Orange) is ONLY for the main 'Call to Action' (e.g., 'Start Crawl', 'Upload').
Status Colors: Success = Emerald-500, Error = Red-500, Warning = Amber-500, Info = Blue-500.
Borders: Use borders to define structure. No shadows in 'Swiss Mode'.
Gradients: FORBIDDEN. Use solid colors only.

layout.grid_system: Mode B: The Control Room Grid
strategies: Dashboard Home: 4-column grid. Summary cards (col-span-1), Recent Activity (col-span-2 row-span-2).
Forms: Single column max-w-2xl for focus, or 2-column 'Split View' (Form Left, Preview/Instructions Right).
Lists: Full width tables with sticky headers.

cards.style: border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-none rounded-md

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-none rounded-md font-medium
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-md

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the background (opacity 0.02) to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a technical look.
visual_enhancers.empty_states: Use abstract architectural line art or simple geometric shapes.
visual_enhancers.loading_states: Skeleton loaders with a 'shimmer' effect. No spinning circles unless absolutely necessary.

types: Hover: Color shift or border darken.
Modal: Scale in (0.95 to 1) + Fade in.

hero_abstract.description: White building with sky - Use for Login/Welcome screen background or side panel.
Green plant beside white house - Use for 'Success' states or empty dashboard placeholders.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/ibm-plex-sans' and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Swiss Control Room' colors and font families.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Mode B' grid for the Dashboard Home.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove excessive roundness (use rounded-md) and shadows.
5. DATA DISPLAY: Use Tables for PDF lists. Use Cards for Job Status.
6. THEME: Implement the Light/Dark mode toggle using 'next-themes' or similar provider.
7. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text meets APCA contrast standards. Use 'data-testid' on all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
